author: Basically Homeless
description:
In this video I go on a quest to install 17,000 viruses onto a goopy Wii. Huge thanks to Straight Arrow News for sponsoring the video! Go to https://SAN.com/basicallyhomeless to get better news only on the Straight Arrow News app and stay fully informed with Unbiased, Straight facts.
